DataElement.preferredName: Lumpectomy Chest Wall Total Fractions Known Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total number of radiation fractions administered in a boost field to a lumpectomy or chest well is known.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lumpectomy Chest Wall Fraction  Radiation Therapy Total Fractions Known
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Surgery to remove abnormal tissue or cancer from the breast and a small amount of normal tissue around it. It is a type of breast-sparing surgery._The total system of structures outside the lungs that move as a part of breathing; it includes all structures from the skin to the parietal pleura._information related to total radiation therapy fractions._Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days._Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Surgery to remove abnormal tissue or cancer from the breast and a small amount of normal tissue around it. It is a type of breast-sparing surgery.:The total system of structures outside the lungs that move as a part of breathing; it includes all structures from the skin to the parietal pleura.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: The surgical removal of a discrete mass.
The total system of structures outside the lungs that move as a part of breathing; it includes all structures from the skin to the parietal pleura.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:Dividing the total dose of radiation therapy into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.:Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
Radiation therapy in which the total dose delivered is divided into several smaller, equal doses delivered over a period of several days.
Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
